com.adidas.connect.api

Interface ScvApi


  • public interface ScvApi
    API endpoints of the SCV service. See retrofit2.Retrofit#create(Class) for documentation on format and annotations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <any> createAccount(CreateAccountRequest requestData)
      Intended for registering a new user account in SCV.
      <any> createLightAccount(CreateLightAccountRequest requestData)
      Create a light account in SCV.
      <any> createSubscription(CreateSubscriptionRequest requestData)
      Create a subscription.
      <any> deleteAccount(DeleteAccountRequest requestData)
      Delete account.
      <any> emailLookUp(EmailLookUpRequest requestData)
      Used to check if an email exists in the SCV DB or not.
      <any> handleResetPassword(HandleResetPasswordRequest requestData) 
      <any> lookUpAccount(LookUpAccountRequest requestData)
      LokkUpAccount
      <any> resetPassword(ResetPasswordRequest requestData) 
      <any> updateAccount(UpdateAccountRequest requestData)
      Used to update the personal information, add, update or delete the address information, update newsletter information of a recipient.

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        <any> createAccount(CreateAccountRequest requestData)

      • updateAccount

        <any> updateAccount(UpdateAccountRequest requestData)
        Used to update the personal information, add, update or delete the address information, update newsletter information of a recipient.

      • emailLookUp

        <any> emailLookUp(EmailLookUpRequest requestData)
        Used to check if an email exists in the SCV DB or not. Will also return the UCI, eUCI as condition code parameters if the email lookup was successful.

      • lookUpAccount

        <any> lookUpAccount(LookUpAccountRequest requestData)
